summary: In a Mars base the inhabitants are being infected by a mysterious water creature which takes over its victims. The Doctor is thrust into the middle of this catastrophe knowing a larger one is waiting around the corner.
cast: David Tennant|Lindsay Duncan|Peter O'Brien|Aleksandar Mikic|Gemma Chan|Sharon Duncan-Brewster|Joplin Sibtain|Alan Ruscoe|Cosima Shaw|Michael Goldsmith|Lily Bevan|Max Bollinger|Charles De'Ath|Rachel Fewell|Anouska Strahnz|Zofia Strahnz|Paul Kasey
keywords: tenth doctor|fixed point|mars colony|carrot|man wears a spacesuit
title: The Waters of Mars
